definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: What if the SPDC caught him?
sentences.chinese: 要是被政府军抓住怎么办？

sentences.english: The rebel held unclaimed with rebel-held enclave is coming under sustained pressure from the armyand .
sentences.chinese: 反叛者现在受到政府军强大的持续性的压力之下。

sentences.english: That night they tortured them behind the classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 那晚政府军在教室后面折磨他们。

sentences.english: Even so, Afghan government forces are unreliable and incompetent.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，阿富汗政府军还是靠不住而又不称职的。

sentences.english: NATO and the rebels in Surt have finally checkmated Qaddafi.
sentences.chinese: 北约和苏尔特的反政府军终于“将死”了卡扎菲。

sentences.english: Refugees accuse both government troops and rebels of burning villages in Burundi .
sentences.chinese: 难民们对政府军和叛军焚烧村庄的行动表示谴责。

sentences.english: Human Rights Watch accused government troops of placing mines last month south of Ajdabiya.
sentences.chinese: 观察指责政府军上个月在阿季达比耶以南埋置地雷。

sentences.english: The Afghan National Army and police are supposed to step into the breach.
sentences.chinese: 按计划，阿富汗政府军和警察要逐步填补空缺。

sentences.english: The rebel-military engagement Vecchio witnessed was unusual.
sentences.chinese: 维奇奥所目击的叛军与政府军的交战并不寻常。

sentences.english: He describes how the soldiers accused the old men of helping set land mines.
sentences.chinese: 他描述政府军怎样指控这三个人协助布下地雷。

sentences.english: Government forces, he said, were holding back to observe the cease-fire.
sentences.chinese: 政府军正克制并观察这场所谓的停火。

sentences.english: The government's own troops are ill-equipped and rarely paid.
sentences.chinese: 政府军装备不良，军饷都很少发。

sentences.english: The city of Hama has been under military attack since Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 自上周日以来，哈马市一直遭受政府军的攻击。

sentences.english: The rebellion against the government has been suppressed by the government troops.
sentences.chinese: 反政府的叛乱已被政府军平定了。

sentences.english: Opposition fighters there said they had repelled Wednesday's attack by government forces.
sentences.chinese: 反对派战士说，星期三他们击退了政府军的进攻。

sentences.english: It is reported that the governmental troops have successfully squelched an armed coup.
sentences.chinese: 据报道政府军成功地粉碎了一起武装政变。

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
